CustomField.formula:
(Total_Deposits_1__c + Total_Deposits_2__c + Total_Deposits_3__c + Total_Deposits_4__c + Total_Deposits_5__c + Total_Deposits_6__c + Total_Deposits_7__c + Total_Deposits_8__c + Total_Deposits_9__c + Total_Deposits_10__c+ Total_Deposits_11__c+Total_Deposits_12__c) /
if( if(Total_Deposits_1__c =0,0,1)+if(Total_Deposits_2__c =0,0,1)+if(Total_Deposits_3__c =0,0,1)+ if(Total_Deposits_4__c =0,0,1)+if(Total_Deposits_5__c =0,0,1)+if(Total_Deposits_6__c =0,0,1)+ if(Total_Deposits_7__c =0,0,1)+if(Total_Deposits_8__c =0,0,1)+if(Total_Deposits_9__c =0,0,1)+ if(Total_Deposits_10__c =0,0,1)+if(Total_Deposits_11__c =0,0,1)+if(Total_Deposits_12__c =0,0,1)=0,1,if (Total_Deposits_1__c =0,0,1)+if(Total_Deposits_2__c =0,0,1)+if(Total_Deposits_3__c =0,0,1)+ if(Total_Deposits_4__c =0,0,1)+if(Total_Deposits_5__c =0,0,1)+if(Total_Deposits_6__c =0,0,1)+ if(Total_Deposits_7__c =0,0,1)+if(Total_Deposits_8__c =0,0,1)+if(Total_Deposits_9__c =0,0,1)+ if(Total_Deposits_10__c =0,0,1)+if(Total_Deposits_11__c =0,0,1)+if(Total_Deposits_12__c =0,0,1) )
CustomField.label: Avg Total formula
